text: The pizza was great. I mean really delicious, but the time it took to start ordering our food was crazy. The line wasn’t even long. It took quite a bit of time. text: Blaze is actually one of the best quick service pizza places on town. The lemonade is also a great choice

Awesome food, Friendly staff, great atmosphere..
